      Oracle operator.

      Black box operator which takes state |i> |1> -> |i> |base^i mod n>
      private Operator Deutsch.constantOperator()
      Returns the constant unit operator
      private Operator DeutschJozsa.constantOperator()
      Returns the constant unit operator
      private Operator Grover.diffusion()
      Diffusion operator, leaves 0 state unchanged but negates all the others.
      private Operator Shor.fourier(int numQubits)
      Quantum Fourier Transform (QFT) operator applied to the first numQubits qubits
      private Operator Deutsch.getRandomOperator()
      Returns randomly either a balanced or a constant operator
      private Operator DeutschJozsa.getRandomOperator()
      Returns randomly either a balanced or a constant operator
      private Operator Shor.invFourier(int numQubits)
      Inverse Quantum Fourier Transform (IQFT) operator applied to the first numQubits qubits
      private Operator QuantumAdder.SQubitAdder(int first, int second, int zero)
      Add 2 qubits with a carry
